E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1992
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Ramon Silvas



Date: Thursday, 4/24/1992
Subject: Julio Benedicto learns new position
Julio Benedicto has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of George Robinson
Dear Sir,
George Robinson shouldn't play at AA Cordan Crows!
He has an AVG of .234 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Marion Thomas
Dear Sir,

He has an AVG of .322, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 5/10/1992
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Shawn Deckert



Date: Sunday, 5/11/1992
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Scott Mcintyre
